# description

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the hand pose parameters.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing hand pose model parameters

- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the hand pose parameters suitable for debugging.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the hand pose parameters that’s viewable in a playground.
